GhApi.list_events[source]

GhApi.list_events(username=None, org=None, owner=None, repo=None, per_page=30, page=1)

Fetch public events for repo network, org, user, or all

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

GhApi.list_events_parallel[source]

GhApi.list_events_parallel(username=None, org=None, owner=None, repo=None, per_page=30, n_pages=8)

Fetch as many events from list_events in parallel as available

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
ev = api.list_events_parallel(org='fastai')
len(ev),ev[0].org.login

(240, 'fastai')
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

fetch_events[source]

fetch_events(types=None)

Generate an infinite stream of events optionally filtered to types

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
for o in islice(fetch_events('PullRequestEvent'), 100): print(o.id, end=' ')
